thread.title: Coronation Street spoilers: Soap airs shock murder scenes as Phelan kills Andy
thread.title_full: Coronation Street spoilers: Soap airs shock murder scenes as Phelan kills Andy

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: Coronation Street spoilers: Soap airs shock murder scenes as Phelan kills Andy
text:
(Picture: ITV) Coronation Street have shocked fans with violent death scenes as Pat Phelan has murdered Andy Carver in a dramatic showdown – before then casually heading off to marry Eileen Grimshaw. 
The dramatic turn of events came as Phelan caught Andy trying to record a confession and a fight broke out leading to Andy’s death. Andy hit Phelan over the head with a laptop but not hard enough because Phelan then retaliated with much more ferocity.
And, as Andy dies, Phelan has officially crossed the line to become a Corrie murderer. He had previously watched Michael Rodwell die but hadn’t physically murdered him but now he seriously has blood on his hands – as well as a body.
(Picture: ITV) Smugly telling Andy that he has a new ending for the story Andy wrote about a villain getting his comeuppance, Phelan slammed the laptop down on his victim and was next scene loading evidence into a van and texting Steph as Andy to say that she is better off without him.
(Picture: ITV) But will Phelan get away with his crime – or has he gone too far this time and is on the brink of a comeuppance at last?
MORE: 25 soap spoilers: EastEnders deadly disaster, Coronation Street suicide drama, Emmerdale hostage horror, Hollyoaks killer showdown
